tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE musician_statistics (
    musician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    musician_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_streams INT,
    total_downloads INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE songs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  artist_id INT,
  release_date DATE,
  genre VARCHAR(100)
);
CREATE TABLE Musicians ( musician_id INT PRIMARY KEY, musician_name TEXT, musician_genre TEXT )
CREATE TABLE Songs ( song_id INT PRIMARY KEY, song_title TEXT, musician_id INT, release_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE StreamingStats ( song_id INT, streaming_date DATE, streams_count INT )
CREATE TABLE DownloadStats ( song_id INT, download_date DATE, downloads_count INT )
